page.title: 14LIFE-STYLE:MY DAY BY CLARE
page.content: I'm Clare Piper and I am eight years old.I have a Mum and a Dad.My brother David is six years old.We both wear glasses I play on my bike sometimes.I have my breakfast.Often I have toast.After breakfast I get ready for school.I wear a skirt and a jumper.Then I go to meet the bus and go to the school.We do reading,maths and writing. We have assembly. I have a school dinner but some of my friends have sandwiches.I practise the recorder at break. We do nice things in the after noon like craft and music,topics and dance. School ends at 3.15. I go home on the bus.When I get home I watch television.Then I have tea and play with David.Nobody else lives near.I got to bed about seven o'clock. { }
